title: Review: All-new Specialized Trail-Series Pant and Air Long Sleeve Jersey
content:
Specialized recently announced their Spring ’21 collection of technical and casual apparel for road cyclists and mountain bikers. Details on most of the collection is thin on the ground but we do have the low-down on the all-new MTB Pants! We got the Specialized Trail-Series Pant and Air Long Sleeve Jersey in for testing. Here’s […]

The post Review: All-new Specialized Trail-Series Pant and Air Long Sleeve Jersey appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
